definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: By the way, it requires that you already have Snow Leopard.
sentences.chinese: 顺便提一句，它要求你已事先安装了“雪豹”系统。

sentences.english: But the President was sympathetic to the plight of the leopard.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，总统对雪豹的下落还是十分关心。

sentences.english: Naturalistsestimate that there are less than a thousand snow leopards left on theplanet.
sentences.chinese: 博物学家估计，地球上还剩不到一千只雪豹。

sentences.english: Both are reflected in Snow Leopard.
sentences.chinese: 两者都在雪豹操作系统中得到了反映。

sentences.english: A wild baby snow leopard has been caught on camera.
sentences.chinese: 山地摄影机抓拍到一只野生幼年雪豹的影像。

sentences.english: But I don't consider Snow Leopard a must-have upgrade for average consumers.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我并不认为普通电脑用户非要升级到雪豹不可。

sentences.english: We were able to see American bald eagle, racoon , snow leopard, and a three-legged bear.
sentences.chinese: 我们看到秃鹰，脘熊，雪豹，还有一直三条腿的熊。

sentences.english: Snow Leopard's Finder is a different beast.
sentences.chinese: 雪豹搜索是一个不同的野兽。

sentences.english: The elusive Central Asian snow leopard steps into the risk-filled future.
sentences.chinese: 中亚雪豹正逐步步入充满风险的未来。

sentences.english: Apple said Snow Leopard is more crash resistant than its predecessor and is 6GB smaller.
sentences.chinese: 苹果说雪豹比前身更具有抗摔性，并且只有6GB大。

sentences.english: In the nineteen seventies, George Schaller became one of two westerners to observe a snow leopard in Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 夏勒成为在尼泊尔的2个西方人之一来观察雪豹。
貔“指以雪豹为图腾的氏族。

sentences.english: One day, a bad leopard Tai Lung escapes from prison and spreads chaos throughout the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 一天，邪恶的雪豹大龙越狱了，他在和平谷大肆破坏。

sentences.english: This high-altitude landscape of snow and rock is home to the snow leopard, musk deer, and red panda.
sentences.chinese: 这个积雪和岩石的高山是雪豹，麋鹿和红熊猫的家园。

sentences.english: The operating system also trims 7GB from the installation.
sentences.chinese: 雪豹操作系统还将其安装空间缩减了7GB。

sentences.english: The issue also features the first photographs of snow leopards in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 该期杂志还首次拍摄到野生雪豹。

definition: (bird species of China) golden eagle (Aquila chrysaetos)
(bird species of China) saker falcon (Falco cherrug)
